Description: Pottery ostracon with part of one incised line of inscription, with Jesus Christ monogram followed by three letters of a Greek or Coptic name, from the rim of a vessel.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394070) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394070)
